name: Flood (itch) (Joxev, Ret401)
description:
NOTE: You can also download the executable as well as webgl.

Made by Ret401 and Joxev. Submission to Ludum Dare 46, Theme: Keep it alive. 

Take control of Gurt the slime and get to the top of the level. Be careful, you aren't the only one trying to get to the top.

Have fun, and remember: Get to the airlock at all costs.

We have plans on continuing this project after the jam so stay tuned!

*Over 7 levels and 3 modes*

Bandsmen Games Video (2:25)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5wI_UtVuxuI
